Viral Hemorrhagic Fever (Tests for Viral Hemorrhagic Fever Virus Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    31867-5 Lassa virus Ag [Presence] in Serum
    41637-0 Ebola virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunofluorescence
    71708-2 Marburg virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunoassay
    71768-6 Ebola virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunoassay
    7946-7 Lassa virus Ag [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
